pr_title: fix: (2.33) Persisting compulsory data elements in data set

timeline.message: fix: (2.33) Persisting compulsory data elements in data set

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason we are making name not-unique now?
timeline.author: stian-sandvold
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,7 +15,7 @@
     </id>
     &identifiableProperties;
 
-    <property name="name" column="name" access="property" unique="false" not-null="false" type="text" index="in_categoryoptioncombo_name" />

replies.bodyText: it was non-unique before as well. unique is false by default so I have removed it.
replies.author: zubaira
